name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meeting-stage-reaction-raisehand-api-csharp
title: Meeting Stage Reaction Raisehand Api
shortDescription: The Reaction API allows you to react in the meeting stage. The types of reactions include like, heart, laugh, etc and The Raise Hand API allows your app to show if the user has raised hand during the meeting.
longDescription: The Reaction API allows you to react in the meeting stage. The types of reactions include like, heart, laugh, etc and The Raise Hand API allows your app to show if the user has raised hand during the meeting.
